name: PDF Whitepaper Analyzer
author: Shinkai

analysisGuide.description: Template defining analysis focus areas, key points to extract, and output format. Optional - uses default analysis

description: A tool to analyze PDF documents by extracting text and processing it with language models and search engines.

pdfUrl.description: Public HTTP/HTTPS URL to whitepaper PDF. Must be accessible and valid PDF format (not password-protected)

analysis.description: Structured analysis following guide template, including key findings, methodology, and conclusions

projectAndAuthors.description: Extracted metadata: project name, company/organization, author names, and affiliations

reviews.description: Related project/author reviews from academic sources and industry publications
